sources.title: Behind Stone Walls
sources.description: For some reason, I found this early talkie interesting despite the stilted dialog, poor acting, and lack of retakes.

sources.title: Behind Stone Walls (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Edward J. Nugent, Priscilla Dean, Ann Christy
Director: Frank R. Strayer

An adulterous wife kills her lover. Her loyal stepson, confesses to the crime and is carted off to prison, but eventually the real murderer's conscious gets the better of her.

metadata.Plot: Esther Clay, wife of District Attorney John Clay and mother of attorney Bob Clay, is having an affair with Jack Keene. Scorned by him Esther kills Jack. Bob comes to her defense and confesses to the shooting. The father prosecutes the son who receives a life imprisonment sentence. Jack Keene's butler Druggett knows the truth and blackmails Esther. Bob's girlfriend Peg Harper summons John Clay to the scene...
metadata.Actors: Edward J. Nugent, Priscilla Dean, Ann Christy
